name: Franklin Covey Co.
description: Franklin Covey Co. is a global leader in performance improvement, offering a wide range of consulting services, training programs, and tools designed to help organizations and individuals achieve their most important goals. Founded in 1997, the company originated from the principles of time management and personal effectiveness established by FranklinCovey's co-founder, Stephen R. Covey, author of the best-selling book 'The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People'. Today, Franklin Covey serves clients worldwide, providing solutions in areas such as leadership development, productivity enhancement, and strategy execution. The company is particularly known for its innovative training programs, workshops, and digital learning solutions that empower individuals and teams to focus on priorities, improve productivity, and foster collaboration. With a mission to enable greatness in people and organizations everywhere, Franklin Covey continues to evolve its offerings by integrating cutting-edge technology and research-driven methodologies into its practices. The company believes in building a culture of trust and accountability, which is essential for achieving lasting success in the fast-paced and ever-changing business landscape.
